It is also worth noting that the EBSCO LearingExpress uses the term ‘Center’ in two different ways.

  • “Center” is the term used to identify the individual modules that are grouped by subject.
  • “My Center” identifies the location of your account and all the items you’ve saved, such as practice tests, eBooks, tutorials, or flashcards.
